text:
Hello All,
If anyone knows about Associations, can you suggest me I need to create an association in my HubSpot Account or are there some pre defined associations? My Use Case is I want to associate Meetings with Contacts.
I have private apps in Nodejs that use the node-cron task scheduler - works for me <https://www.npmjs.com/package/node-cron>

Hello,
A HubSpot rep reccomended I join this channel. I had a quick question about adding a Linkedin insight tag to my global footer of my website (HS hosted). Do I just add it directly below my google snippet here? I am starting Linkedin Ads Monday and want to confirm this is setup properly.

:sparkles:Slack Tips and Best Practices:sparkles:

To get the most out the HubSpot Developer Slack, follow these best practices:

• Will your post/question potentially help more than one person? Ask in a public channel instead of 1:1 DMs to help as many folks as possible. 
• Thread all replies to keep topics organized and searchable
• Thread followup questions/comments to your original post
• Don't post the same question in multiple channels. If you must, link to your original question in new channels.
More <https://slack.com/blog/collaboration/etiquette-tips-in-slack|great tips here>. Thanks for making the HubSpot Developer Slack easier to use for everyone!
Is there a way to programmatically remove specific blog pages from the XML sitemap?

On HubSpot cms platform  I am building a website and blog pages, I am trying to make sure the blog has the same root domain as the pages but to no avail

the pages have this url structure <http://seattlenad.com/about|seattlenad.com/about>, <http://seattlenad.com/services|seattlenad.com/services> etc but the blog pages have all different domains eg <http://433323.com/|433323.com/>

how can i make the blog post have url structures like this: <http://seattlenad.com/blog/why-we-are|seattlenad.com/blog/why-we-are>.....................
Hey there! I'm a general software engineer with interest in HubSpot. Which certificates do you suggest for me to become a HubSpot developer?
